page.title: 08Snape Village Show,Yorkshire
page.content: The Village Show is held in August on Bank Holiday Monday in the Village Institute.Its official name is Snape Flower Show,but there are 125 classes in different categories, flowers, vegetables,fruit,housewives section, children's section, plants and needlework. Anyone living in Snape Parish may enter,prizes are modest ranging from 10p to 75p. Judging takes place from 11a.m. and the Show opens at 2 p.m. On the Village Green, there is a coconut shy, a tombola, hoopla game and a stall selling crisps and fizzy drinks.The Fancy Dress and Pet Competitions are also held on the Green.Teas are served in the Chapel Schoolroom. Races are held in the evening and the Ice-cream Man comes.
